mea: Ko nga mea katoa ka nui te waahi me te papatipu
hu\u0101nga: Ko te matū parakore he mea hanga mai i te momo ngota kotahi anake
ngota: Te waeine iti rawa o te matū ka uru ki te tauhohenga matū
p\u016bhui: He matū i hangaia e rua, neke atu rānei ngā huānga kua herea matū
r\u0101poi ngota: Rōpū ngota ngota e hono matū ana
ranunga: Te whakakotahitanga o nga matū e rua neke atu ranei kaore i te whakakotahi matū
riterite: Whakaranuhia me te hanganga rite puta noa (hei tauira, te otinga)
momotuhi: Te ranunga me te hanganga kore-rite (hei tauira, te whakatārewatanga)
\u0101hua: Puka kei roto te matū (totoka, wai, hau, plasma)
m\u0101r\u014d: Te ahua o te matū me te tino ahua me te rōrahi
wai: Te ahua o te matū me te rōrahi pū engari karekau he āhua pū
hau: Te ahua o te matū karekau he tino ahua, he rōrahi rānei
tauhohenga: Te matū ka huri i te tauhohenga matū
hua: He matū hou i hanga i roto i te tauhohenga matū
herenga: He kaha te pupuri i nga ngota ki roto i te ngota ngota, te puhui ranei
t\u0101tai mat\u016b: He huarahi poto mo te tohu matū ma te whakamahi tohu me nga tau
wh\u0101rite mat\u016b: He tohu tohu o te tauhohenga matū
otinga: He ranunga taurite o te wairewa (matū memeha) me te whakarewa (matū memeha)
kuk\u016b: Te nui o te wairewa kua memeha i roto i te nui o te whakarewa
waikawa: He matū ka koha katote hauwai (H+) ki te wai
turanga: He matū e whakaae ana i nga katote hauwai (H+) i te wai
whakakorenga: Tauhohenga i waenganui i te waikawa me te kawakore, ka hanga he tote me te wai
p\u016bngao: Te kaha ki te mahi mahi
p\u016bngao mat\u016b: Te pūngao pūmanawa e rongoa ana i roto i ngā here matū o tētahi matū
